StraKLIP
  • Documentation for StraKLIP
  • Edit on GitHub

Documentation for StraKLIP

StraKLIP is a Python-based data reduction and analysis toolkit for HST wide field imaging data. The development has mostly been focused on ACS and WFC3-IR/UVIS imaging. It is built on top of pyKLIP and provides functionality and customizations specific to HST data.

Compatible Simulated Data: Here
